version_description:
1. Newbie Special Program: any first time trading users can purchase bitcoins at the best price.
2. More optional payment methods.
3. User experience improved.

1.Making scratchcard better
2.Add new type of notification
3.When placing order, it will be faster now
4.fix bugs

1. New report function. Anytime, anywhere. You can report abnormal behavior to the platform;
2. Added masking function. Can effectively block malicious/harassing traders;
3. Upgraded the customer service center. You can view the search FAQ, or create your own tickets if you have any questions.
4. New bulletin board display. You can now view the official announcement;
5. Added some rules. The buyer part of the transaction behavior has been standardized;
6. Optimized the complaint function. Fixed display elements of complaints, upgraded appearance for interface;
7. Order optimization. Under the sale of a single need to confirm;
8. Increased security, fix known bugs, etc..
We hope this little improvements can make CoinCola usability even better.

1. New report function. Anytime, anywhere. You can report abnormal behavior to the platform;
2. Added masking function. Can effectively block malicious/harassing traders;
3. Upgraded the customer service center. You can view the search FAQ, or create your own tickets if you have any questions.
4. New bulletin board display. You can now view the official announcement;

6. Optimized the complaint function. Fixed display elements of complaints, upgraded appearance for interface;
7. Order optimization. Under the sale of a single need to confirm;

We hope this little improvements can make CoinCola usability even better.

CoinCola-ETH is now supported! Thousands dollars worth of ETH to win!
Withdrawls and deposits are available now, trading will be ready soon!
 
1.       The first 300 users who deposit ETH: Win 0.01 ETH,
2.       The first 100 users who deposit more than 50 ETH: Win 0.1 ETH,
3.       The first 10 users who deposit more than 500 ETH: Win 0.5 ETH,
4.       The first 10 users who deposit more than 1000 ETH: Win 1 ETH.
 
Time: Right now to Nov. 15th 2017
CoinCola will distribute ETH awards within 15 days.
Maximum one award per person, you can invite your friends to CoinCola and win ETH together!

CoinCola-ETH is now supported! Thousands dollars worth of ETH to win!
Withdrawls and deposits are available now, trading will be ready soon!
 
1.       The first 300 users who deposit ETH: Win 0.01 ETH,
2.       The first 100 users who deposit more than 50 ETH: Win 0.1 ETH,
3.       The first 10 users who deposit more than 500 ETH: Win 0.5 ETH,
4.       The first 10 users who deposit more than 1000 ETH: Win 1 ETH.
5. Fix bugs
 
Time: Right now to Nov. 15th 2017
CoinCola will distribute ETH awards within 15 days.
Maximum one award per person, you can invite your friends to CoinCola and win ETH together!

CoinCola new update is up and running: full support for multi-currency over-the-counter transactions, ETH whopping release, advertising rates decreased as low as 0.3%, keep tuned as we have more currencies coming soon!

- BCH trading
- online customer service
Fully adapts iPhone X

1.Added support for Google Authenticator
2.Users now need to enter their code to release the coins
3.Upgraded system security mechanism
4.Optimized trading experience

1.LTC has been surported on CoinCola
2.Strengthen real name authentification, sellers have rights to verify the real name of buyer
3.2-FA is more better when binding
4.FaceID and TouchID can use when releasing crypto currency
5.fix bugs

1. Real-name authentication now supports international users
2 New ad optimization features, new rate instructions, users can now view the global price ranking when they create ads.
3. Release of a new feature: you can now directly adjust the price of your ad based on the top ads on the marketplace.
4. It is now possible to cancel your transfer.
5. Post-trade chat optimization, advertising list optimization.
6.Language switch added Korean version.

1.Exchange is added. Exchange supports BTC/USDT, ETH/USDT, LTC/USDT, BCH/USDT pairs;
2. The interface is renewed. New homepage, new interface, new experience, and more exciting activities will be newly presented;
3. OTC is renewed. Buying and selling , posting an AD, ADs management , and order management are all in OTC section;
4. The wallet is is renewed. It was divided into exchange and OTC wallets, both wallets support deposit, withdraw and transfer;
5. Inviting friends is upgraded. More rebate activities, more invitation methods.

1. Exchange added BTC trading pairs
